ai-patthana21.1:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.1:1.1_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-patthana21.1:2.1_0: You shouldn’t give rise to skillful qualities because of this,
ai-patthana21.1:2.1_1: You don’t give a teaching with cause and condition for the sake of skillful.
ai-patthana21.1:2.1_2: You shouldn’t give up a unskillful and skillful qualities because of cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.1:2.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.1:3.1_0: You shouldn’t give a teaching with cause and condition for the sake of unskillful.
ai-patthana21.1:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.1:4.1_0: or indeterminately, without indeterminate, cause, conditioned by reasons.
ai-patthana21.1:4.1_1: Not cause or reason, without reason,
ai-patthana21.1:4.1_2: It’s not because of indicating or prescribing, or cause, reasoned only to give rise to cause a reason.
ai-patthana21.1:4.1_3: This is the section in brief.
